channel.title: ~Need some help~
channel.description:
alright. i need some help moving a prayer alter and i also need some help making shops, i am using the pulsepk source if that helps.
i see the shops.java and all that is in there is the item id and amount... i cannot find where to edit the item prices? please help!!
thanks

item.title: ~Need some help~
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

codeusa i believe. im pretty new to coding so yeah =p
and also where do i change the prices of the items in my shops? i have the shops.java open and all i see is stuff like this –

public int[] CraftingShop = {4151};  // the items
public int[] CraftingShopN = {100};   // the amount

theres no price?
